column5: Could somebody give me the current fuel prices in Ottawa/Hull area? Gas vs. diesel please...debating on which vehicle to bring. Thnaks. gb

No need to decide what to bring........ Diesel is the way to go in the summer period! Gas is about .64Cents/L and Diesel about .57/L. Take the diesel and save wear and tear on the gas engine not to mention cheeper fuel, more power and better milage on the Diesel.
